## lchToLAB() function

Converts a [ColorLCH](./fast-colors.colorlch.md) to a [ColorLAB](./fast-colors.colorlab.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function lchToLAB(lch: ColorLCH): ColorLAB;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lch | [ColorLCH](./fast-colors.colorlch.md) | the lch color to convert |
